doc.field: Matthew Gorham
Matthew Gorham
Methodist Episcopal Church in Brooklyn quarterly conference minutes
Methodist Episcopal Church in Brooklyn quarterly conference minutes

Bound handwritten minutes of the quarterly conference of the Methodist Episcopal Church in Brooklyn, spanning the period 1824 to 1834. The minutes contain lists of meeting attendants and brief notes on the types of business transacted.

Bound handwritten minutes of the quarterly conference of the Methodist Episcopal Church in Brooklyn, spanning the period 1824 to 1834. The minutes contain lists of meeting attendants and brief notes on the types of business transacted.
